word: Many and wonderful are the promises recorded in the Scriptures regarding the church. "Mine house shall be called an house of prayer for all people" (Isaiah 56:7). "I will make them and the places round about my hill a blessing" (Ezekiel 34:26). . . . "Behold, I have graven thee upon the palms of my hands; thy walls are continually before me" (Isaiah 49:16).
